ing: 1 (3 ounce) package fruit flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 unsweetened, flavored soft drink mix package
des: "I made these for my children and now will be making them for my granddaughter.  Putting them in paper drink cups saves on messy fingers!"
ins: In large pitcher, combine gelatin, soft drink mix, sugar and boiling water.  Stir until powders are dissolved.  Add enough cold water to make 2 quarts.  Pour into 3 oz. paper drinking cups and freeze until hardened.
